indent.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to start a line of writing further towards the middle of the page than other lines
indent.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Use the Tab key to indent the first line of the paragraph.
indent.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an official order for goods or equipment
indent.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He cancelled the indent for silk scarves.
